description: An ultra lightweight and super breathable 5 inch running short optimised for comfort when covering long distances on challenging mountain trails. High wicking with a barely-there feel, they feature a mesh brief and comfortable compressive waistband.
name: Rab Talus Ultra Shorts, 5" Inseam - Mens
